20.05.19.name: wordpress/flickr-eyecandy
20.05.19.description:
flickr_eyecandy is a very simple Wordpress Plugin.

It provides a Wordpress Widget that selects and displays one random photo from Flickr in the sidebar, each time the page loads. The plugin uses the Flickr API, and authenticates via an API key that YOU (the installer) acquire via the Yahoo API Console.

It does not present a gallery. It's just one photo. The photo changes when you reload the page, but it does not change while the page is being displayed.

You specify a tag or set of tags to filter the photos. For example, if you specify "usa,flag", you will get only photos tagged with "usa" and "flag".
